channel.title: Electronics Club, IIT Madras
channel.description: Recent content on Electronics Club, IIT Madras

item.title: Apple Watch
item.description: Apple Watch is a line of smartwatches produced by Apple Inc. It incorporates fitness tracking and health-oriented capabilities with integration with iOS and other Apple products and services.

item.title: Fun IMU Session
item.description: Taught the working of MPU6050 IMU sensor and physics behind in depth. Explained the I2C communication protocol.With I2C, we obtained the accelerometer, gyroscope, temperature data from the sensor.

item.title: IoT Weather Station
item.description: Introduced to the Internet of Things(IOT) , how it works and where it is used. Using temperature sensors(LM35) we explained about the temperature sensor.

item.title: Machine Learning on MCU
item.description: Participants explored the basics of Machine Learning. Explained in depth about Random Forest Classifier ML algorithm. Built a Harry Potter Magic Wand project as the end project.

item.title: Python for embedded system
item.description: Introduced the participants to the basics of MicroPython. Explained the working of OLED, Joystick and Buzzer. Ping Pong Arcade game was built with the help of the above concepts.
